entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AOT/Compiled model: Somewhat complex entity with enums produces compiled model that contains AOT warnings #34057
  • AOT/Query: for queries with JSON, interceptors generate code with labels that are not uniquified #34056
  • Add-Migration in Package Manager Console never completes breaking package manager until VS2022 exit #34055
  • Indexes are created by default for foreign keys in non-relational databases #34053
    9.0.0
  • How to use custom annotations through migrations #34049

Closed

  • Querying all objects of a type hierarchy #33972
  • Cosmos: projection of primitive collection throws when entity type embeds owned types #34008
    9.0.0-preview7
  • The Cosmos type mapping source is too permissive #34022
    9.0.0-preview7
  • Cosmos type mapper does not call plugins first #34041
    9.0.0-preview7
  • I keep getting: The foreign key property 'Vehicle.CustomerId1' was created in shadow state because a conflicting property with the simple name 'CustomerId' exists in the entity type #33883

PullRequests

Created

  • Index convention changes for non-relational providers #34054
    providers-beware
  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #34051
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #34050
  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048

Merged

  • Cosmos: Minor refactoring of array extraction/conversion as extension methods (trivial) #34045
  • Stop generating includes in nav expansion for primitive collection properties #34047
  • Changes and tests for Cosmos type mapping #34042

Updated

  • fixing cosmos test failures on linux #34058
